We were given a room on the ninth floor but we requested a higher floor as I am a light sleeper and needed something less quieter. This was easily done with no fuss and in the end the room we were given was much bigger in size.

Staff were attentive and friendly, housekeeping was done daily and the women were always so kind whenever they would knock on our door. The concierge and doormen always had a smile on their face which overall gave us a great vibe. 

The only thing I would say is maybe request a bathroom without a bath as they were quite low. The first room we were given had a modern shower in it but the one we stayed in for the rest of the week had a bath and shower with a shower curtain. 

The location is great for those who want to be near all the designer shops and central park. The subways are in great distance with so many to choose from.

Overall, a great stay for very good value with lovely staff.

title: Everything was perfect
text: This beautiful property is in the perfect location close to major NYC attractions and boasts beautiful rooms and great staff. Every member of the staff we encountered went above and beyond. We’ll be back soon!

title: Great Hotel and location
text: Stayed here over black Friday weekend and loved it. The location was perfect and subway just round the corner. It's located just off 5th Ave almost next door to St Patrick's cathedral. 10 mins away from times square and central park. The rooms were lovely and clean, big super king-size beds that was very comfy. Maids cleaned to a high standard everyday. Staff were nice and very friendly. All in all a great hotel and superb location, hopefully if I get the opportunity il be booking here again. Thanks for a great stay.

title: nel cuore della grande mela
text: centralissimo,pulitissimo, (certo che se gli americani avessero il bidet...)offre ottimi servizi in una zona dove tutto e' carissimo-Lo conìsiglio a chi va a NY per la prima volta perche' walking distance offre molte location da visitare (sei praticamete sulla quinta ..)io non ho mangiato in hotel avevo solo il pernotto.al 17 piano terrazza su san patrick e palestra ....

title: Family trip to NYC
text:
Went to the omni Berkshire hotel after also visiting their hotel in Cancun,Mexico. Check in / out was very easy and hassle free! Booked with Virgin Holidays and everything went smooth and hassle free. Fresh towels and bedding everyday. 

The best thing about this hotel is the location. Just a short walk away from all the shopping you could need. About 5 minutes from the rockafella centre. Doorman are always available to sort taxi’s if you want to go downtown to 9/11 memorial. Omni , well done.

title: Anniversary
text: Stayed for 4 nights at Omni Berkshire hotel,amazing trip hotel staff were lovely very helpful.We stayed in room 633 not the best views but probably better as was away from busy street at front of hotel.Rooms really big with comfy beds.Rooms had safe.Near Tiffanys,Trump Towers and St Patrick Cathedrall short walk to times square.Concierge were really helpful.Loved this hotel hopefully we will be back soon.

title: Great Location and value
text: The Omni Berkshire is a great hotel when it comes to location and value.  It is accessible by foot to the Theater district, Columbus Circle and East Midtown.  We stayed in a large room #1908 with a Terrace overlooking Madison to the East.  The staff was pleasant and helpful.

title: Great hotel, central and good value for money
text:
Spent 5 nights here on a trip to NY with my daughter. Whilst we only used it as a base for a very busy 5 day trip of sight seeing and shopping, but we could not fault the hotel at all. 
It’s a central location, good sized, clean room with comfortable bed. Very helpful and friendly staff. Would not hesitate to return.

title: This is what a stay at a hotel in NYC should be
text:
A few months ago my wife and I stayed at a hotel on 42 Street for our anniversary. It was an ordeal that we never want to repeat again; between not being able to walk 10 feet in the area without someone trying to sell you something; surly front desk clerks and being given a timeshare pitch on the way to our room, it was not a pleasant stay. Thats why  we looked forward to staying at the Omni, and it did not disappoint.

The Omni is located a little farther away from the theater district and costs a little more, but its in much classier area and is worth the extra money. We have stayed in Omni hotels through out the country and they are generally very good. Upper management of this chain understands one of the basic principles of hospitality, you make money on return business; offer a great product and treat your customers with respect and they will keep coming back. That is where this hotel and this chain excels at.

The hotel is clean, the rooms are large for New York and the staff is professional.

The one fault I have with this hotel is that the prices in their restaurant, "Bobs", were very high for breakfast. Fortunately there is a deli across the street that is very reasonable and it is a good alternative to the Omni's restaurant.

title: Tired hotel
text:
This was a wonderful hotel at one time with nice rooms and above average housekeeping 
I have been staying here for many years On my last 2 visits, I have found that the housekeeping has significantly deteriorated The coffee mugs in the room were dirty and were never cleaned as was the coffee machine; we cleaned these ourselves. On the last night when we got into bed we had to remake the bed which the housekeeper left in a mess under the bed cover.
I think this hotel needs a refurbishing and perhaps more dedicated management

title: Excellent New York City Hotel
text: Great location, very friendly staff at this hotel.  We loved staying right in midtown because it was so easy to get anywhere in the city.  The concierge was very helpful.  The staff at the front desk and door were great- very friendly and polite every time you went in and out of the building.

title: Great Location!
text: I spent 3 nights at the Omni Berkshire Place on a recent long weekend in New York City. The hotel is perfectly situated a block from the nearest subway station and a few blocks' walk from Rockefeller Center and Times Square. The hotel is on a side street which isn't very busy, so it feels like you're away from the middle of the crowds. I booked a King Premier Executive Room, and I couldn't get over how spacious it was! I have stayed in many city hotels, and this is by far the largest I've ever been in. There was a small foyer separating the bedroom from the bathroom and plenty of room to move around. Free wifi comes with a loyalty membership, and it worked perfectly. The water pressure in the shower was a bit too strong and felt like pelting. Otherwise, everything about the room was great. All of the staff were wonderful too. If there was any drawback, it was the lack of a comfortable lounge to relax in. The bar is part of the steakhouse restaurant, and didn't feel like a place to relax with a drink and a book or to work on a laptop. I would definitely recommend this hotel!

title: Great location and staff
text:
Hotel is great value.  The rooms were a nice size and price for being so conveniently located in New York City.  We were able to walk to almost everywhere we wanted to go.  It was surprising quiet given the close proximity to Time Square and other major attractions.

The hotel went out of their way to make the occasion we were celebrating (my nieces 16th birthday) memorable.  Upon arrival to our room we were surprised to a special birthday desert and a bottle of apple cider campaign waiting for my niece.  They also wrote a touching note wishing her a Happy Birthday.  It set the stage for a wonderful trip and great stay.

I would recommend this property.

title: dirty bedlinen
text: We have spend many nights at this hotel and other Omni hotels and always been very happy. This time when we went to get into bed the sheets had clearly not been changed from the previous guest. Rather nasty to say the least. When called they came quickly to change the bed linen however the pillow covers did not get changed until I asked for those to get changed as well. Seriously,come on Omni !! we did get a call with an offer for free breakfast which we declined. Still had a good night sleep and hotel is in great location.

title: Fabulous hotel & great location!
text: Clean, great location and wonderful service! I would go back again in a heart beat! Room was clean and service great. I have to write more to post this and I can't think of anything else......this is why I don't post very often.

title: Worst experience ever
text: Do not stay here. Staff is very rude and I will never stay here again. The manager during Veterans Day was even more rude than the desk clerk the night before . Food was not good . We did not receive the quality of service you would expect for 1,000.00 a night. We will never go back to an Omni hotel again.

title: Fantastic stay!
text:
We stayed at the Omni hotel for a weekend trip in NYC. The location was perfect, right by 5th avenue, steps from Times Square, and close to Central Park.  We stayed in the one-bedroom suite. The room was clean and well decorated, it was big enough to accommodate four adults. It felt more like an apartment than a hotel room. The sofa bed in the living room was as comfortable as a real bed.  Everything was perfect during our stay, especially the wonderful staff: everyone was courteous and kind, and treated us so well!
I had a great time and would definitely stay there again!

title: Excellent location! Larger than typical NYC rooms
text: Very, very good and well run hotel in fantastic location. Walk to most of the NYC tourist sites. High ceilings in guest rooms. Street-view rooms have very large window, so usually good natural light. Clean and well maintained. Front Desk, Bell Service, Room Service, Concierge Service all are highly professional with seemingly zero staff turnover (for years). Be certain to join Omni's (I think still free) loyalty program (called "Omni Select Guest") which provides a choice of coffee, tea or hot chocolate and one juice for up to 2 people per room per night and a newspaper each morning. No struggling with an in-room coffee maker!!! This is a HUGE, classy, Omni Select Guest perk. This is the only place we stay in NYC, that's how happy we have been with the hotel and its staff. Enjoy.

title: Excellent stay in a nice room
text: Perfectly well located close to Madison and 5th Avenue best part of Midtown. Thanks to the Select guest program, we had an excellent quiet room. some members of our group were nat as satisfied as we were.

title: Amazing location, great service
text: Perfect place for our stay - Would never look anywhere else if planning a NYC break!  Nice, large, clean room, with a great view (although our view from the 5th floor also came with a bit of night noise).  Might stay higher up next time.

title: Un séjour extraordinaire
text:
J'ai visité New York le week-end dernier et mes amis et moi avons logé au Omni Berkshire Place pour 3 nuits.   Nous avons été reçus comme des rois.  Un accueil des plus courtois par le directeur adjoint, David, qui a pris en charge notre séjour sur place.     

 L'hôtel est moderne, chaleureux et extrêmement bien situé.  Le service est excellent.   Nous demandions le service du café pour 10h le matin et à 10h précises nous l'avions à la porte.   Les employés sont accueillis et souriants et nous guident dans notre séjour à travers cette très grande ville.    

C'était ma première visite au Omni mais c'est certain que lors de ma prochaine visite, je vais y séjourner à nouveau.   Il est situé à 5 minutes de marche seulement de Time Square, à 15-20 minutes maximum de Central Park, près du métro et de tout ce que nous recherchions pour notre séjour.   et c'est certain que c'est l'hôtel que je vais référer à tous mes amis et famille.  Merci encore !

title: De retour a New York et a l'hotel Omni Berkeshire
text: Nous sommes retourné à l'hôtel Omni une autre fois car nous avions adoré l'endroit  La proximité des endroits intéressants à visiter étant au centre de Manhattan  vous permet de marcher pour vous rendre à peu près partout   Les restos,Central Park, Times Square etc  Nous y étions avec des amies et avons réservé une suite WOW!!! Le service impeccable , la propreté et la gentillesse du personnel nous a encore séduit  L'ambiance du bar et la qualité du service à notre arrivée ne pouvait être mieux  Le resto offre une belle variété de menu nous y avons souper à notre arrivée  et déjeuner et déjeuner à notre départ Tout était plus que parfait et nous y retournerons sans hésiter à notre prochain voyage

title: Un séjour au delà de nos attentes
text: Nous avons séjourné dans une très belle suite avec un service impeccable. À notre arrivé nous avons pris un temps pour relaxer au bar de l’hotel Un bel ambiance avec un très bon service   L’hotel Est situé tout près de tout   Vous pouvez marché facilement pour visiter ou vous rendre à un metro   Le restaurent vous offre une belle variété de menus et encore une fois vous êtes servi comme des rois   Nous avons adoré notre séjour à cet hôtel

title: Poor Customer Service and Room Quality
text: My wife and I were just in NYC for a seven day stay.  I have to say, for what we spent, you would have thought you could get better customer service.  The front of the house employees (doorman, bellhop, front desk) were all rude at some point in time during the stay.  I will say the cleaning folks were very nice.  The bed wasn't very comfortable and the pillows were worn out flat.  Additionally, there was next to no counterspace in the bathroom.  I had to keep my items on a glass shelf above the toilet, worried something would fall in, while my wife had the small space around the sink.  There isn't a food option outside of Bob's Steak and Chop which is attached to the hotel.  It's not what you want for a quick or light meal.  You have to walk across the street to get a soda, snacks or a light sandwich.

title: Good Choice
text: We have stayed at Omni Berkshire a number of times and will continue to do so when coming back to New York city. We love the hotel and the location. The staff and service was excellent. Our dinning experience at Bob's Steak restaurant was lovely. The rooms are clean. The beds are excellent.

title: Great stay in NYC
text:
Took my granddaughter for her birthday and the Omni Berkshire place was perfect! Location could not be beat, you can walk to all the sights, Rockefeller center, radio city music hall, Times Square etc.
The hotel staff is very helpful and if you become an Omni member they will bring you coffee in the morning!!!
Our room was a little noisy but everything else made up for that!

title: Disappointing!
text: We have stayed at this hotel many times  and I was shocked with the  lackluster service  and the tired the decor. On this trip, we stayed in the $800 suite because it was a very special trip. When we arrived at the Manhattan Suite, I was immediately disappointed in the decor....it looked like it had been gathered from a thrift store.  The closet is tiny and there was nowhere to unpack. I called to inquire about this and they offered to bring up a chest of drawers so I could unpack.  Still very little closet space....maybe 4 items could be hung. The bathroom is very small and outdated.    Upon our arrival I asked the concierge, Kevin, to make a reservation for us on our last night at Ciprianis.  I never received a message or a written confirmation so on the day of our reservation I called the concierge to confirm.  I was told there was no reservation and no record of one being requested. (I distinctly remember speaking to Kevin because I waited while he and his coworker were discussing inviting the intern to their holiday party.)  We were so disappointed and he did not even ask me if he could make a reservation for me elsewhere. I made my own reservation for dinner that night on OpenTable.  As we were checking out the clerk at the desk did not ask me if I enjoyed my stay, or if there was anything he could help me with regarding luggage or transportation.  I’m afraid this is my last day at the Omni Berkshire. Even the location is not enough to win me back. I don’t like to be negative but I feel like I should be honest. The only positive thing I can say is that the doormen, Lenny and Tony, were delightful

title: Great Hotel
text: perfect location and experience I stayed here at least 8 times close to shopping, theater, restaurants and  subway nice restaurant downstairs. great gym a good deli across the street nice size rooms and great service

title: Very comfortable beds great location
text:
The rooms were comfortable, clean and quiet.   The bed was so soft and cosy.  Room was quiet and large for NYC.  Everyone at front desk was helpful (except cranky female consigere.
Close to Central Park, St Patrick’s, shopping and lots of places to eat or drink.

title: Great Boutique Hotel near Rockefeller Center
text: Efficient and elegant with close proximity to City's best destinations including Rockefeller Center and City Center.  The staff is friendly and the property has an upscale aura without a oppressively high price.

title: Great location for good hotel
text: Very nice accommodations. Staff friendly and helpful. Room comfortable and very quiet which is unusual in the city. Coffee maker in room was not great. Had to ask for it. I️ think they prefer room service

title: Great place
text:
I was looking for a hotel near Central Park, and this is great place to visit. Position is great - not fat away from Central
Park on one side, and Times Square on other side.

Staff is super-nice and helpfull. Rooms are nice size and really clean. 

Must do: go to the 17 floor and visit a balcony there (next to fitness centar). Great view to enjoy!

title: excellent hotel rooms service and location
text: Excellent hotel, very spacious and nice room especially clean, the staff was very friendly and the extraordinary location reaches the 5th avenue and central park in 3 minutes, from now on whenever I return to NY I will try to always be at the Hotel Onmi Berkshire Palace

title: Amazing and accommodative hotel.
text: We travelled with our 14 mth old for the NYC marathon weekend. We had a number of requests such as a crib, fridge and others and all were accomadated. We arrived to check in at 10am and was told our room wouldn’t be ready but if we wanted for an extra $30 a night there was a suite room available. As early checkin fee would have been $75 the extra $15 got us a very nice spacious room which was set up with our requests within 20 mins of entering the room which was appreciated as we had to put our baby down to sleep. Hotel is very well located and ideal for either seeing the sights of New York or if you’re running the marathon.

title: Perfect Paradise
text: Wonderful stay. Excellent Hotel, service, location ! Very helpful and friendly staff, very clean and great location to everything. You will surely be treated like family and that they want you to come back again. Wonderful time !

title: broadway visit
text: excellent place to stay centrally located can walk to all atrractions to eat ,broadway,shopping also excellent welcoming staff value for money parking in and out with short time wait use this facility each visit ti NYC

title: Great first time experience!
text:
We will be back. We were there for a family event and the location was great for our activities. The rooms  were large for NYC with exceptionally friendly staff from the doormen, waitstaff, housekeeping and front desk.  All were accommodating.

Special shout out to Juan in the restaurant who remembered our orders!

title: 5 nights in an Oasis of quietness
text:
My Wife and I stayed here in October , we booked a deluxe room  and found that the room view was of some offices at the back or side of the hotel ...... for a split second I was disappointed , but after the first night I was very happy with this Oasis of calmness after walking all over NY !  The room was very comfortable and very clean and very quiet , every ( and I mean every) staff member smiled and said hello , it was my wife’s birthday while we stayed and the hotel gave us a small cake and a bottle of Bubbly , a very nice touch , we did not eat on site so cannot comment on the food , finally as we left , I asked the doorman to get us a cab to JFK , he mentioned that we could get a private transfer for $10-$15 more , the car was already there parked up so no waiting time ( I say the car ........it was a  Black Cadillac Escalade )  so  a very comfy ride to JFK , 
This really finished off the trip to NY , there’s no doubt , the next time I go to NY I will stay here

title: Quiet clean room
text: It was the quietist room I've ever had in NYC.  The location was very convenient and the staff was very helpful.  It was a great stay.  My sister and I did not spend a lot of time in the room but we were amazed at how quiet it was late at night.  You couldn't even hear the sirens that usually blast all night.

title: Ideal Place to stay whenever I come to NY
text:
My 2nd trip there. Definitely will come back.
Great location, friendly staff, clean room and very efficient. Came on a biz trip but would come for non business as well. One suggestion would be to enable early check in.
